name: Saguaro Cactus
description: The Saguaro Cactus is an iconic symbol of the American Southwest. It can grow to enormous heights and has distinctive arms.

name: Prickly Pear Cactus
description: The Prickly Pear Cactus is known for its flat, paddle-shaped stems and colorful flowers. It produces edible fruit known as prickly pears.

name: Barrel Cactus
description: The Barrel Cactus is named for its cylindrical shape and ribbed texture. It's a popular choice for xeriscaping due to its low water needs.

name: Fishhook Barrel Cactus
description: The Fishhook Barrel Cactus is named for its hooked spines. It's native to the southwestern United States and northern Mexico.
